channel.title: 562 jar client?
channel.description:
Hey, I'm a nice java coder but I really don't understand jar stuff like manifests. Could someone tell me how to make a client running fine in jar? Include cache is not really needed but it would be nice... Anyway, it's to let the LINUX and MAC users. I searched, I tried, the client is still not working! :(
Thanks for your help!
